sn35.21:1.1: “Mendicants, the arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the eye is the arising of suffering, the continuation of diseases, and the manifestation of old age and death.
sn35.21:1.2: The arising, continuation, rebirth, and manifestation of the ear …
sn35.21:1.6: and mind is the arising of suffering, the continuation of diseases, and the manifestation of old age and death.
sn35.21:2.1: The cessation, settling, and ending of the eye is the cessation of suffering, the settling of diseases, and the ending of old age and death.
sn35.21:2.2: The cessation, settling, and ending of the ear,
sn35.21:2.6: and mind is the cessation of suffering, the settling of diseases, and the ending of old age and death.”
